caption.p: Impacts of CO 2, temperature and aphid presence on dry mass of Medicago sativa when growing in (A) non-supplemented and (B) Si supplemented soil. Mean values ± standard error shown ( N = 20) with statistically significant effects indicated ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01, and ∗∗∗ P < 0.001. Significant factors for the whole experiment given in the upper panel (see Table 1 for full results) and for Si– and Si+ plants separately in the respective graphical panels.
